articles.author: Abel Alvarado, Tara John, Ana María Cañizares
articles.title: Ecuador hit by nationwide blackout, leaving 17 million in the dark - CNN
articles.description: Ecuador was hit with a nationwide blackout on Wednesday, leaving the South American nation’s 17 million people without power.
articles.content:
Ecuador was hit with an hours-long nationwide blackout on Wednesday that left the South American nations 17 million people without power.
The blackout which affected hospitals, homes, and a major su… [+2247 chars]

articles.title: Nearly half of Americans struggling because of inflation spike: poll - New York Post
articles.description: Nearly half of Americans report that the recent spike in inflation is making it harder to make ends meet, according to a new poll.
articles.content:

articles.title: Millions face record-breaking temperatures amid dangerous heat wave - PBS NewsHour

articles.title: Doctors are worried by misinformation about sunscreen on social media - NPR
articles.description: Doctors are concerned by a backlash against sunscreen that is spreading on social media. Recent surveys suggest many younger Americans are buying into this misinformation.
articles.content: Doctors are concerned by a backlash against sunscreen that is spreading on social media. Recent surveys suggest many younger Americans are buying into this misinformation.
